titleStmt.title: An orthodox plea for the sanctuary of God, common service, white robe of the house being writ for the good of all, but more especially intended for the common sort, being composed in a stile fittest for their capacities / by G.A. Sometime of Oxford, of St. Johns.
titleStmt.author: Alsop, George, b. 1638.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for the author, and sold by R. Reynolds ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to George Alsop. cf. BM.
